1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Built-in relmap operator.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Rop
6  ( ropsBuiltin,
7    -- * id
8    consId, relmapId,
9    -- * xxx
10    consXxx
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core               as C
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Define    as Rop
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message   as Msg
17
18-- | Built-in relmap operator.
19--
20--   [/r/ @|@ /s/]   Append relmaps
21--
22--   [@id@]          Identity relmap
23--
24ropsBuiltin :: [C.Rop c]
25ropsBuiltin = Rop.ropList "builtin"
26    --        CONSTRUCTOR    USAGE               ATTRIBUTE
27    [ Rop.rop consAppend   [ "append R R"    O.& "-left/ -right/" ]
28    , Rop.rop consId       [ "id"            O.& "" ]
29    ]
30
31-- | Append relmaps.
32consAppend :: C.RopCons c
33consAppend = app . map snd . C.medSubmap where
34    app [a,b] = Right (a O.++ b)
35    app _     = Msg.reqRelmap 2
36
37-- | __id__
38--
39--   Identity relmap, i.e., output just input relation.
40--
41consId :: C.RopCons c
42consId med = Right $ relmapId med
43
44-- | Create @id@ relmap.
45relmapId :: C.Intmed c -> C.Relmap c
46relmapId med = C.relmapFlow med $ Right . C.relkitId
47
48-- | Placeholder for unimplemented operator.
49consXxx :: C.RopCons c
50consXxx _ = Msg.notImpl
51
